bill.summary: 10/8/2002--Reported to Senate amended. Glen Canyon National Recreation Area Boundary Revision Act of 2002 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire approximately 152 acres of private land in exchange for approximately 370 acres of land within the boundary of Glen Canyon National Recreation Area. Requires the boundary of the area to be revised to reflect the exchange.Increases the ceiling on the amount of total acreage allowed in the Area.
